bug.author: dmartinez05
bug.summary: Link to this repo from https://autokeras.com/ is broken
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
The link at <denchmark-link:https://autokeras.com/>https://autokeras.com/</denchmark-link> to this repo is broken. <denchmark-h:h3>Reproducing Steps</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Step 1: Go to https://autokeras.com/ Step 2: Click into Edit on GitHub

comments.comment: help needed. Does anyone know how to fix it? Thanks Sent with GitHawk

Right now mkdocs/docs/index.md is dynamically generated. It's not actually placed in the repository. MkDocs's <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mkdocs/mkdocs/>official repository</denchmark-link> is a good demonstration. Maybe we should just put all the docs in one place.
